pages.text: Follow this route on the Path of the Aegis if you want to bolster your allies with high tier protective magic. As the Champion of the Meek, casting spells shields and protects you and your allies. Your Grace spells last slightly longer with Lesser Enduring and gain double XP with Graceful, and damage to the undead is increased with Smiting.

pages.mods: Champion of the Meek, Lesser Enduring, Graceful, Smiting
